definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: His smile spread out to his cars again, and he headed for the checkouts .
sentences.chinese: 他又咧開嘴笑了，趕快奔向收款臺。

sentences.english: Please go to cash desk to pay.
Hi, it's Sue at the register upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我是樓上收款臺的蘇。

sentences.english: Please pay at the cash desk over there.
AT the cashier's desk. Just follow the arrow, please.
sentences.chinese: 在收款臺，順着箭頭指的方向走。

sentences.english: The checkout counters are extremely busy at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 現在收款臺十分的忙碌。

sentences.english: When I got to the checkout. I realized .
sentences.chinese: 我到收款臺時，才意識到我把錢包忘在家裏了。

sentences.english: Please say at the cashier's desk. It's over there.
sentences.chinese: 請到收款臺交錢，就在那兒裏。

sentences.english: Thank you . Will you pay at the desk , please ? Anything else ?
sentences.chinese: 多謝。請到收款臺交錢。還要別的嗎？

sentences.english: A strange noise was heard as they approached the checkout counter.
sentences.chinese: 當他們走近收款臺的時候，傳來一陣奇怪的聲音。

sentences.english: Hi, it's Sue at the upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我是樓上收款臺的蘇。

sentences.english: Fill in your selection here and take to a pay point.
sentences.chinese: 在此選購商品填單，而後到收款臺付款。

sentences.english: Yes, please pay at the cashier's.
Things were even cheaper than we thought by the time we got to the till.
sentences.chinese: 到收款臺後我們發現比我們想象得還便宜。
